response.output: {"is_vuln": "yes", "cwe": "CWE-22", "title": "Path Traversal via user-controlled filename", "rationale": "The application uses an unvalidated user input 'n' directly in `Paths.get()` to construct a file path. An attacker can manipulate 'n' with directory traversal sequences (e.g., '..') to read arbitrary files outside the intended directory."}

An attacker can manipulate 'n' with directory traversal sequences (e.g., '..') to read arbitrary files outside the intended directory."}
